cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP control port to 0 will cause socket binding failures and prevent F1 control plane establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of TX antennas to 0 will cause transmission failures and prevent RF signal generation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 TX 天線數量設定為 0 會導致傳輸失敗，並阻止 RF 信號產生。
